Message.Title: What's with this POS today
Message.Msg: With markets handling well and the way EBAY reported earnings last week, this thing should be flying IMO. WHAT A PIECE OF #$%$TTT

all ecommerce retails are down, due to some ETF liquidation. AMZN, EBAY etc.. i just added to my position, this is good story, buy only companies that have positive guidance for Q4, else Q4 will be horrible,
